params.allowedTemplateIds: Array of template IDs that satisfy this requirement
params.isRequired: Whether this group must be satisfied
params.label: Human-readable label for this requirement
params.maxRequired: Maximum documents allowed from this group
params.minRequired: Minimum documents to sign from this group
params.priority: Signing order priority (lower number = sign first, e.g., 1, 2, 3)

returns.eligible: True if the signer can sign

params.documentId: Unique document identifier (content hash of personalized doc)
params.storageURI: IPFS or storage location of personalized document
params.title: Human-readable title

returns.documentId: The document ID the investor signed (bytes32(0) if none)

returns.signedByGroup: Array of signed template IDs for each requirement group

returns.satisfied: True if all required groups are satisfied

returns.signedAt: Timestamp when signed (0 if not signed)

returns.hasSigned: True if investor has signed the required document

removeDocumentRequirement(uint256).details: Can only be called before any investments are made

setCustomEligibilityModule(address).details: Only admin can change custom module

params.module: Address of custom eligibility checker contract

setDocumentEligibilityMode(uint8).details: Only admin can change eligibility mode

updateDocumentRequirement(uint256,uint8,.details: Can only be called before any investments are made

params.label: New human-readable label for this requirement
params.maxRequired: New maximum documents allowed from this group
params.minRequired: New minimum documents to sign from this group
params.priority: New signing order priority (lower number = sign first)

getDocumentRequirement(uint256).notice: Get a specific document requirement by index

getInvestorSignedDocument(address).notice: Get the document ID that an investor signed

getInvestorSignedDocumentsByGroup(addres.notice: Get which templates an investor has signed from each requirement group

getRequiredDocumentInfo().notice: Get the required document template information

hasSignedAllRequiredDocuments(address).notice: Check if investor has satisfied all required document groups

hasSignedDocument(address,bytes32).notice: Check if investor has signed a specific document

hasSignedRequiredDocument(address).notice: Check if investor has signed the required document
